member.name: M:HISPlayerSettings.HISPlayerSettingsiOS.IsPluginiOSOnly(UnityEditor.PluginImporter)
member.summary: Look for the selected platforms in the iOS native plugin. In the case iOS is not the only one selected platform returns false

member.name: M:HISPlayerSettings.HISPlayerSettingsiOS.UnselectPlatforms(UnityEditor.PluginImporter)
member.summary: Disable all the platforms from the list except iOS
